entry.title: solide-project/stylide: ⚡Lightweight web based Stylus IDE
entry.content: ⚡Lightweight web based Stylus IDE

entry.title: gridbox-dev/gridbox-mailer: Gridbox Mailer is a lightweight package built on top of Nodemailer. It simplifies email sending by managing SMTP connections, loading customizable HTML templates, and supporting attachments. Perfect for developers looking for an easy and efficient way to integrate email functionality into their projects.
entry.content: Gridbox Mailer is a lightweight package built on top of Nodemailer. It simplifies email sending by managing SMTP connections, loading customizable HTML templates, and supporting attachments. Perfect for developers looking for an easy and efficient way to integrate email functionality into their projects.

entry.title: vixhnuchandran/Lean-Queue: LeanQueue is a lightweight Node.js application designed for efficient management of task queues. Built on the Express framework and powered by PostgreSQL.
entry.content: LeanQueue is a lightweight Node.js application designed for efficient management of task queues. Built on the Express framework and powered by PostgreSQL.

entry.title: kaisalayasa/Bus-Time: Bus-Time is a lightweight, personal project built with React. It was created because the official bus station app wasn’t working on our phones. This app uses the local bus transit API to fetch live departure data and display the next bus arrivals for the stations we frequently use. Built with the goal of quickly checking when the next bus is due.
entry.content: Bus-Time is a lightweight, personal project built with React. It was created because the official bus station app wasn’t working on our phones. This app uses the local bus transit API to fetch live departure data and display the next bus arrivals for the stations we frequently use. Built with the goal of quickly checking when the next bus is due.

entry.content: Lightweight API for storing, retrieving, and managing data along with automated versioning.

entry.title: heyloura/lillihub-client: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.
entry.content: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.

entry.title: thisgirlElan/iPay-payment-gateway: A lightweight and customizable React Native SDK for integrating the iPay payment gateway. Supports multiple payment channels like Mpesa, Airtel, and credit cards, with secure hash generation, configurable callbacks, and seamless toggling of payment options.
entry.content: A lightweight and customizable React Native SDK for integrating the iPay payment gateway. Supports multiple payment channels like Mpesa, Airtel, and credit cards, with secure hash generation, configurable callbacks, and seamless toggling of payment options.
